name: Badlands
description: A rugged badland creates natural barriers and hides valuable minerals, but the harsh terrain makes travel extremely difficult. The eroded landscape provides excellent defensive positions, while the lack of water and vegetation creates survival challenges.
atmosphere: Harsh eroded landscape with rugged terrain and stark beauty. Dry air scented of earth and stone. Natural mazes and defensive positions, but extremely difficult travel. Rugged beauty inspires awe.
